description: Census Data is collected every 10 years by mail surveys to every household with primary data collection fields of population, gender, race and number of occupants. Additional data related to households, economy, employment, occupation, as well as occupancy and building structure data is generalized from samples of a subset of the population.

name: Census Block Groups 2010
